mapper.select: SELECT id FROM members WHERE id=#{id} AND pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET address = #{address}, member_call = #{member_call}, email = #{email}, team_code = #{team_code}, job_code = #{job_code}, member_level = #{member_level} WHERE id = #{id}
update members set email=#{email}, team_code=#{team_code}, job_code=#{job_code}, member_call=#{member_call}, ent_yn=#{ent_yn},end_date=#{end_date} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.pw, m.name, m.email, t.team_name, j.job_name, m.member_level, m.member_call, m.gender, m.ent_yn, m.vacation_period FROM members m LEFT JOIN team t ON m.team_code = t.team_code LEFT JOIN job j ON m.job_code = j.job_code

SELECT m.id, m.pw, m.name, m.email, t.team_name, j.job_name, m.member_level, m.member_call, m.gender, m.ent_yn, m.vacation_period FROM members m LEFT JOIN team t ON m.team_code = t.team_code LEFT JOIN job j ON m.job_code = j.job_code WHERE m.team_code = #{team_code}
select count(*) from members where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update members set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.pw, m.name, m.email, t.team_name, j.job_name, m.member_level, m.member_call, m.gender, m.ent_yn, m.vacation_period FROM members m LEFT JOIN team t ON m.team_code = t.team_code LEFT JOIN job j ON m.job_code = j.job_code WHERE m.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%' ORDER BY m.name

select m.id, m.name, m.team_code, t.team_name, m.job_code, j.job_name, t.dept_code, d.dept_name from members m left outer join team t on m.team_code = t.team_code left outer join job j on m.job_code = j.job_code left outer join department d on t.dept_code = d.dept_code where id = #{id}
select vacation_period from members where id = #{id}
